title: Google\Cloud\Build\V1\PullRequestFilter
name: PullRequestFilter
description:
PullRequestFilter contains filter properties for matching GitHub Pull Requests.

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudbuild.v1.PullRequestFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.branch
params.description: Regex of branches to match. The syntax of the regular expressions accepted is the syntax accepted by RE2 and described at https://github.com/google/re2/wiki/Syntax

params.name: data.comment_control
params.description: Configure builds to run whether a repository owner or collaborator need to comment /gcbrun.

params.name: data.invert_regex
params.description: If true, branches that do NOT match the git_ref will trigger a build.

methods.description:
